snippet: The ratings for Tuesday’s televised Democratic skirmish fell short of an earlier forum hosted by WABC-TV on Aug. 13, which had an audience of 449,000.
abstract: Trailside blog; 225,000 viewers tune in to televised New York City Democratic mayoral debate on WNBC-TV, with additional 100,000 viewers watching on local Spanish-language network Telemundo Neuva York; ratings outpace previous Democratic debate, with drew about 50,000 viewers.
lead_paragraph: The ratings for Tuesday’s televised Democratic skirmish fell short of an earlier forum hosted by WABC-TV on Aug. 13, which had an audience of 449,000.
